title: Learn TensorFlow.js - Deep Learning and Neural Networks with JavaScript
excerpt: This full course introduces the concept of client-side artificial neural networks. We will learn how to deploy and run models along with full deep learning applications in the browser! To implement this cool capability, we’ll be using TensorFlow.js (TFJS), TensorFlow’s JavaScript library.  By the end
